author: iSazonov
body:
Follow tasks discussed in #2373 are addressed in this PR:
- [x] Move "string" to const
- [x] Use StringBuilder everywhere

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@iSazonov**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @PowerShellTeam In the first commit I've completed the first two tasks and I need of code review before I can continue with the main task.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @iSazonov Thanks for refactoring the code to clean things up! Would you like we merge your refactoring work first? You can then work on the Suppress feature on top of the merged changes. I think that will give both you and the reviewer a cleaner change sets to look at.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @iSazonov Thanks! I have updated the PR title and description to make it clear that this PR focuses on the refactoring work. Please open another PR when the 'Suppress' support work is ready.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @daxian-dbw Thanks! Yes, I will open a new PR.

title: Refactor 'Get-WinEvent' to use StringBuilder for XPath query construction
